page.title: 05GREAT LONGSTONE (CE) SCHOOL
page.content: {Great Longstone (CE) School is a small {school,there are 53 children in the {school in l985. {In top class there are 20 children and {In the middle class there are 16 {children and In the infants there are {17 children. the girls play skittle {ball and net ball. The boys play foot {ball and cricket. boys and girls {together play rounders and nonstop {cricket and allsorts of other games. {Out side is a play ground and two big {fields and a conservtion area. At the {back of the school there is a {vegetable garden and a patch of grass {and everything for the birds. The new {part of the school was built in 1971. {In the new part there are 3 class {rooms and an office. The old part of {the school was built In 1862. The old {part is used as a hall but it used to {be two class rooms.
